code: import{collatedTasks}from'../constants';export var getTitle=function getTitle(projects,projectId){return projects.find(function(project){return project.projectId===projectId;});};export var getCollatedTitle=function getCollatedTitle(projects,key){return projects.find(function(project){return project.key===key;});};export var collatedTasksExist=function collatedTasksExist(selectedProject){return collatedTasks.find(function(task){return task.key===selectedProject;});};export var generatePushId=function(){var PUSH_CHARS='-0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ_abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz';var lastRandChars=[];return function(){var now=new Date().getTime();var timeStampChars=new Array(8);for(var i=7;i>=0;i--){timeStampChars[i]=PUSH_CHARS.charAt(now%64);now=Math.floor(now/64);}var id=timeStampChars.join('');for(i=0;i<12;i++){id+=PUSH_CHARS.charAt(lastRandChars[i]);}return id;};}();
